title: How to fix?
body: I got Black screen after I launch new update of design.(patch  6.22) My game is runing with permission of admin.

replies.body:
There's been a few reports of this on the client boards, and our client devs are currently investigating these and looking for solutions.  In the meantime, share your report in the following [thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/irEothGt-workaround-for-launching-the-legacy-client), and use the legacy client as the current workaround:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Hope that helps!
